mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM spittle LEFT JOIN comment ON spittle.id = comment.spittle_id LEFT JOIN spitter on spittle.username = spitter.name WHERE 1=1 AND spittle.username=#{username} ORDER BY spittle.created_at DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spittle (username, text, attachment, enabled) VALUES (#{username}, #{text}, #{attachment}, #{enabled})
